short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed Racer is all about being cautious in driving too fast. The race will take place in an oval track

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed Racer is all about being cautious in driving too fast. The race will take place in an oval track and after passing with the other racer which is driving in the opposite side, the speed will increase little by little. You need to be careful with swerving or else you might crash to the other car. Take the challenge or compete with your friends in a two player mode!
